previous.excerpt: Steps Go to the following link. Paste-in the sub-directory link of the git repo, to download. Link OS Any Required Tools Web Browser

frontmatter.title: Download Sub-directories of a GitHub Repository

next.excerpt:
So avoid using the word ‘very’ because it’s lazy. A man is not very
tired, he is exhausted. Don’t use very sad, use morose. Language was invented
for one reason, boys - to woo women - and, in that endeavor, laziness will not
do. It also won’t do in your essays. Regardless of wooing the women part…
